intro: Enjoy the most realistic and fun house painting simulator you’ve ever seen!
description:
Relax with this house painter simulator, where you have the power to paint various houses just the way you like. Make sure every corner has a smooth, high-quality finish. Unlock upgrades and new tools as you progress, and become the best painter around, a true pro.

Kick back and enjoy – this is an stress-free game, or rather, a game against life’s stress!
